subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: With a regular season that restored the league’s reputation, an off-season that saw it retain its marquee coaches and a postseason bowl record of 4-0, no conference had a year quite like the Big East.
snippet: With a regular season that restored the league’s reputation, an off-season that saw it retain its marquee coaches and a postseason bowl record of 4-0, no conference had a year quite like the Big East.
